verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against them;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Because thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, against my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, when it was \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w*; and against the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when it was \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*; and against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, when they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*;

Behold, therefore I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee to the \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* for a \w possession|strong="H4181"\w*, and they shall \w set|strong="H3427"\w* their \w palaces|strong="H2918"\w* in thee, and \w make|strong="H5414"\w* their \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* in thee: they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, and they shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thy \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*.\f + \fr 25.4 \ft men: Heb. children\f*

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w* a \w stable|strong="H5116"\w* for \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, and the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* a \w couchingplace|strong="H4769"\w* for \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast \w clapped|strong="H4222"\w* \add thine\add* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H7554"\w* with the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* in \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* with all thy \w despite|strong="H7589"\w* against the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;\f + \fr 25.6 \ft hands: Heb. hand\f*\f + \fr 25.6 \ft feet: Heb. foot\f*\f + \fr 25.6 \ft heart: Heb. soul\f*

Behold, therefore I will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon thee, and will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee for a \w spoil|strong="H0957"\w* to the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; and I will cut thee \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will cause thee to \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* out of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: I will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thee; and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 25.7 \ft a spoil: or, meat\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* that \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* and \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* do \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add is\add* like unto all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*;

Therefore, behold, I will \w open|strong="H6605"\w* the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* from the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, from his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add which are\add* on his \w frontiers|strong="H7097"\w*, the \w glory|strong="H6643"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w Beth-jeshimoth|strong="H1020"\w*, \w Baal-meon|strong="H1186"\w*, and \w Kiriathaim|strong="H7156"\w*,\f + \fr 25.9 \ft side…: Heb. shoulder of Moab\f*

Unto the \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* with the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them in \w possession|strong="H4181"\w*, that the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* may not be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 25.10 \ft with…: or, against the children of Ammon\f*

And I will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* upon \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because that \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* hath \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* by \w taking|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, and hath \w greatly|strong="H0816"\w* \w offended|strong="H0816"\w*, and \w revenged|strong="H5358"\w* himself upon them;\f + \fr 25.12 \ft by…: Heb. by revenging revengement\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* from it; and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* it \w desolate|strong="H2723"\w* from \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*; and they of \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 25.13 \ft they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan\f*

And I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* my \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* upon \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and they shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* according to mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and according to my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* my \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* have \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* by \w revenge|strong="H5360"\w*, and have \w taken|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* with a \w despiteful|strong="H7589"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H4889"\w* \add it\add* for the \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w hatred|strong="H0342"\w*;\f + \fr 25.15 \ft for the…: or, with perpetual hatred\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w Cherethims|strong="H3774"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w coast|strong="H2348"\w*.\f + \fr 25.16 \ft sea coast: or, haven of the sea\f*

And I will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* upon them with \w furious|strong="H2534"\w* \w rebukes|strong="H8433"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* my \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 25.17 \ft great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances\f*
